Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has bacteriocidal activity against Gram-positive bacteria, but not against Gram-negative bacteria. Inhibits bacterial protein biosynthesis by acting on the elongation factor Tu (EF-Tu).
Sequence Information.PTM: Maturation of thiazole and oxazole containing antibiot

Literature.Title: Structural studies on thiocillins I, II and III (studies on antibiotics from the genus Bacillus XXIX).
Literature.Author: Shoji J, Kato T, Yoshimura Y, Tori K.

Literature.Title: Isolation of three new antibiotics, thiocillins I, II and III, related to micrococcin P. Studies on antibiotics from the genus Bacillus. VIII.
Literature.Author: Shoji J, Hinoo H, Wakisaka Y, Koizumi K, Mayama M.
